de.sfgmbh.applayer.core.definitions

Interface IntfAppObservable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppException, AppModel, DataModel, RepositoryChair, RepositoryCourse, RepositoryRoom, RepositoryRoomAllocation, RepositoryUser

    public interface IntfAppObservable
    Interfaces for objects from the app layer which should be observable
    Author:
    hannes
